scripts.dev:setup: npx supabase start && npx supabase migration up && npm run dev || npm run check-setup
scripts.check-setup: echo 'It looks like something went wrong. Here are some reminders:' && echo '- Make sure your Supabase project is linked: Run `npx supabase link`' && echo '- Ensure Docker Desktop is installed AND OPEN (not just installed)!' && echo '- Run `npx supabase db pull` to sync with your local database schema (if needed)' && echo '- Make sure your environment variables are set to point to the local database, not the remote one. Check your .env.local file.' && exit 1
